title: Champion silhouette graphics error
body: I have an ASUS 7770 series video card and each time i play league, i see champions and their "character box." If their animations go out side the box, then that part of the champion is not highlighted. I have updated drivers for my video card and computer, I've tried changing the settings from Low to High but i still get this graphic glitch. Is there a way to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey Gorilla Grodd! 

This isn't something related to your graphics card, and is currently an issue on our end in relation to character inking. 

Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=uvsGRhpm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:21:23.306+0000)
>
> Hey Gorilla Grodd! 
> 
> This isn't something related to your graphics card, and is currently an issue on our end in relation to character inking. 
> 
> Thanks for the report!

Wow Thanks for the reply!  Spent about an hour looking up this error but found nothing. Really appreciate it.
